projects.name: redux-bootstrap
paragraph: Bootstrapping function for React / Redux applications.
This library handles most of the common application initialization/bootstrapping that takes place every time you create a new Redux project.

projects.name: InversifyJS
paragraph: An open-source lightweight (4KB) IoC container written in TypeScript.
